scripts.prefetch-cleanup: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json google-gax*.tgz showcase-echo-client*.tgz showcase-server*.tgz
scripts.prefetch-google-gax: cd ../.. && npm pack && mv google-gax*.tgz test/test-application/google-gax.tgz
scripts.prefetch-showcase-echo-client: cd ../showcase-echo-client && npm run prefetch && npm install && npm pack && mv showcase-echo-client*.tgz ../test-application/showcase-echo-client.tgz
scripts.prefetch-showcase-server: cd ../showcase-server && npm install && npm pack && mv showcase-server*.tgz ../test-application/showcase-server.tgz
scripts.prefetch: npm run prefetch-cleanup && npm run prefetch-google-gax && npm run prefetch-showcase-echo-client && npm run prefetch-showcase-server
